column1: [82]  This  case  is  not  concerned  about  the  imposition  of  levy  under  the
Imports and Exports (Control) Act or the Customs Ordinance, and  we are
dealing with the imposition of income tax and the concessionary tax rates
under  Section  47  or  exemption  under  Section  15  (j)  of  the  said  Act.  This
Court  is not inclined to apply the principles of the imposition of levy under
the Imports and Exports (Control) Act or the Customs Ordinance to a case
of export under Sections  15 (j)  or 47 of the Inland Revenue Act.
